languages.text: "Не сожалей, эттфатер. Они погибли с честью, как подобает воинам Всеотца. В чертоге Кьялхаллы их рога будут полны до краев хмельным мьодом". {n}Ульфар страдальчески скрипит зубами.{/n}

"Do not be sorry, Aett-Vater. They died with honour, as the Allfather's warriors should. In the hall of Kjalhalla, their horns will be full to the brim with heady mjod." {n}Ulfar gnashes his teeth in anguish.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Не сожалей, эттфатер. Они погибли с честью, как подобает воинам Всеотца. В чертоге Кьялхаллы их рога будут полны до краев хмельным мьодом". {n}Ульфар страдальчески скрипит зубами.{/n}

traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Do not be sorry, Aett-Vater. They died with honour, as the Allfather's warriors should. In the hall of Kjalhalla, their horns will be full to the brim with heady mjod." {n}Ulfar gnashes his teeth in anguish.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “无需遗憾，狼领。他们死得很光荣，是全父荣耀的战士。他们已经去了卡尔哈拉的圣殿，他们的角杯将盛满美味的蜜酒。”{n}乌尔法痛苦地咬紧了牙。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Do not be sorry, Aett-Vater. They died with honour, as the Allfather's warriors should. In the hall of Kjalhalla, their horns will be full to the brim with heady mjod." {n}Ulfar gnashes his teeth in anguish.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “无需遗憾，狼领。他们死得很光荣，是全父荣耀的战士。他们已经去了卡尔哈拉的圣殿，他们的角杯将盛满美味的蜜酒。”{n}乌尔法痛苦地咬紧了牙。{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「遺憾に思うことはない、アエット＝ヴァテル。こいつらは名誉と共に死んだ、全知の父の戦士としてあるべき姿だ。ヴァルハラの間で、芳醇なミョードを角笛になみなみと注いでるだろうさ」{n}ウルファーは苦悩に歯をきしませる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Do not be sorry, Aett-Vater. They died with honour, as the Allfather's warriors should. In the hall of Kjalhalla, their horns will be full to the brim with heady mjod." {n}Ulfar gnashes his teeth in anguish.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「遺憾に思うことはない、アエット＝ヴァテル。こいつらは名誉と共に死んだ、全知の父の戦士としてあるべき姿だ。ヴァルハラの間で、芳醇なミードを角笛になみなみと注いでるだろうさ」{n}ウルファーは苦悩に歯をきしませる。{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «No lo sienta, Aett-Vater. Murieron con honor, como buenos guerreros del Padre de todas las cosas. En los salones de Kjalhalla, sus cuernos rebosarán con el mejor mjod». {n}Ulfar, angustiado, rechina los dientes.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Do not be sorry, Aett-Vater. They died with honour, as the Allfather's warriors should. In the hall of Kjalhalla, their horns will be full to the brim with heady mjod." {n}Ulfar gnashes his teeth in anguish.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «No lo sienta, Aett-Vater. Murieron con honor, como buenos guerreros del Padre de todas las cosas. En los salones de Kjalhalla, sus cuernos rebosarán con el mejor mjod». {n}Ulfar, angustiado, rechina los dientes.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « Il n'y a pas de raison d'être navré, aett-vater. Ils ont connu une fin digne des guerriers du Père de Tous en périssant honorablement. Leurs cornes seront remplies à ras bord de mjod capiteux dans les halls de Kjalhalla. » {n}Ulfar serre les dents sous l'effet du chagrin qui l'envahit.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Do not be sorry, Aett-Vater. They died with honour, as the Allfather's warriors should. In the hall of Kjalhalla, their horns will be full to the brim with heady mjod." {n}Ulfar gnashes his teeth in anguish.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Il n'y a pas de raison d'être navré, aett-vater. Ils ont connu une fin digne des guerriers du Père de Tous en périssant honorablement. Leurs cornes seront remplies à ras bord de mjod capiteux dans les halls de Kjalhalla. » {n}Ulfar serre les dents sous l'effet du chagrin qui l'envahit.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Das muss Euch nicht leid tun, Aett-Vater. Sie sind ehrenvoll gestorben, wie es Kriegern des Allvaters geziemt. In der Halle von Kjalhalla werden ihre Hörner bis zum Rand mit schwerem Mjod gefüllt sein." {n}Ulfar knirscht schmerzerfüllt mit den Zähnen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Do not be sorry, Aett-Vater. They died with honour, as the Allfather's warriors should. In the hall of Kjalhalla, their horns will be full to the brim with heady mjod." {n}Ulfar gnashes his teeth in anguish.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Das muss Euch nicht leid tun, Aett-Vater. Sie sind ehrenvoll gestorben, wie es Kriegern des Allvaters geziemt. In der Halle von Kjalhalla werden ihre Hörner bis zum Rand mit schwerem Mjod gefüllt sein." {n}Ulfar knirscht schmerzerfüllt mit den Zähnen.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Üzülme Aett-Vater. Onurlarıyla öldüler, Yücebaba'nın savaşçıları böyle ölür. Kjalhalla'nın salonunda boynuzlarından sert mjod taşacak." {n}Ulfar, acıyla dişlerini gıcırdatıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Do not be sorry, Aett-Vater. They died with honour, as the Allfather's warriors should. In the hall of Kjalhalla, their horns will be full to the brim with heady mjod." {n}Ulfar gnashes his teeth in anguish.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Üzülme Aett-Vater. Onurlarıyla öldüler, Yücebaba'nın savaşçıları böyle ölür. Kjalhalla'nın salonunda boynuzları ağzına kadar sert mjod ile dolu olacak." {n}Ulfar, acıyla dişlerini gıcırdatıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
